Please read JUnit: A Starter Guide at http://www.diasparsoftware=
.com under Articles/Presentations. A failure ends a test. If your loop is i=
n a single test method, then that's it.

If you really need 10 tests then c=
reate the TestSuite by hand.

I'll write this up tonight if I have the time=
.
